properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 400 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
IN 34-03N 021-17E AT 110220Z SEP. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
